name: FarmZ
description:
Made for the StaySafe gameJam with the theme "There's always a consequence".

The consequence in this game is; every time you farm crops a yombie will spawn making it harder and harder to survive. 

Please notice this game isn't finished yet so it has a lot of bugs and uncompleted things like:

           Zombie walk animation isn't working.

           The costs of seeds are flipped.

           Nothing happens if you die.

           Not all the sounds are implemented.

           Killing zombies.

           Weapons.

           High scores.

           etc.

                      

Controls:

W, A, S, D: Move.

Shift: Dash.

Space: Farm grown crops.

LeftClick on item in inventory: Use.

RightClick on item in inventory: Drop.

E: Pickup item.

To trade goto the "S A L E S" stand and walk away to stop trading.
